message.raw:
Per issue #213, install ros/atlas_description/manifest.xml to
share/drcsim-X.Y/ros/atlas_description.  Also make the manifest.xml files in
the subdirectories under share/drcsim-X.Y/gazebo_models/atlas_description into
real ROS manifests.

message:
